---
title: "Final_investigations"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = normalizePath("./"))
d = read.xlsx('Final_241_Data_Shared.xlsx')
```

```{r}
DT<-data.table(d)
DT_sub500<-DT[Guess_the_Cost<501]
summary(DT_sub500)
summary(DT[Guess_the_Cost>500])
lm.basic<-lm(Guess_the_Cost~French_Purchasing_Page + German_Purchasing_Page,DT_sub500)
summary(lm.basic)
```
```{r}
DT_sub500_income<-DT_sub500[Household_Income < 7]
lm.cv<-lm(Guess_the_Cost~French_Purchasing_Page + German_Purchasing_Page + Male + Household_Income + English_as_primary + Drink_Frequency + Cab_Preference + Purchase_Frequency,DT_sub500_income)
summary(lm.cv)
```
